name: Multiplayer
description: Create real-time multiplayer online games using WebRTC DataChannels.

conditions.name: Is host
conditions.description: True if host of the current room.

conditions.name: On peer connected
conditions.description: Triggered when connected to a peer (either to host or a peer joining the host).

conditions.name: On peer disconnected
conditions.description: Triggered when disconnected from a peer (either from host or a peer leaving the host).

conditions.name: On kicked
conditions.description: Triggered when kicked from a room.

conditions.name: On peer message
conditions.description: Triggered when received a message with a specific tag from a peer.

params.name: Tag
params.description: The tag to identify the message type.

conditions.name: On any peer message
conditions.description: Triggered when received any message from a peer.

conditions.name: Compare peer count
conditions.description: Compare the number of peers currently in the room.

params.name: Comparison
params.description: How to compare the peer count.

params.name: Count
params.description: Number of peers to compare to.

conditions.name: On client update
conditions.description: Triggered when sending the new client state to the host.

conditions.name: Is ready for input
conditions.description: True when ready to send input to the host. Don't move the local player until this is true.

conditions.name: On error
conditions.description: Triggered if an error occurs with the server list or signalling server.

conditions.name: On connected
conditions.description: Triggered when successfully connected to the signalling server.

conditions.name: On disconnected
conditions.description: Triggered when disconnected from the signalling server.

conditions.name: On logged in
conditions.description: Triggered when successfully logged in to the signalling server.

conditions.name: On joined room
conditions.description: Triggered upon successfully joining a room.

conditions.name: On left room
conditions.description: Triggered upon successfully leaving a room.

conditions.name: Is connected
conditions.description: True if currently connected to a signalling server.

conditions.name: Is logged in
conditions.description: True if currently logged in to a signalling server.
conditions.display_text: Is logged in to signalling server

conditions.name: Is in room
conditions.description: True if currently in a room on the signalling server.

conditions.name: On game instance list
conditions.description: Triggered after 'Request game instance list' when the list has been received from the server.

conditions.name: On room list
conditions.description: Triggered after 'Request room list' when the list has been received from the server.

conditions.name: On host disconnected
conditions.description: Triggered when a peer gets disconnected from the host.

conditions.name: On complete
conditions.description: Triggered when a binary transfer with a specific tag has successfully been received.

params.name: Tag
params.description: Tag of the binary transfer.

params.name: Receive to
params.description: Choose a Binary Data object to write the received binary data to.

conditions.name: On any complete
conditions.description: Triggered when any binary transfer has successfully been received.

params.name: Receive to
params.description: Choose a Binary Data object to write the received binary data to.

conditions.name: On event
conditions.description: Triggered when various binary transfer events happen like a receive starting, or cancellation, for a specific transfer.

params.name: Tag
params.description: Tag of the binary transfer.

params.name: Type
params.description: The binary transfer event.

conditions.name: On any event
conditions.description: Triggered when various binary transfer events happen like a receive starting, or cancellation, for any transfer.

params.name: Type
params.description: The binary transfer event.

conditions.name: On peer binary message
conditions.description: Triggered when received a binary message from a peer.

params.name: Receive to
params.description: Choose a Binary Data object to write the received binary data to.

actions.name: Disconnect
actions.description: Disconnect from peers in the current room, and also leave the room on the signalling server.

actions.name: Send message
actions.description: Send a message to a specific peer.

params.name: Peer ID
params.description: The ID of the peer to send the message to. Leave empty to send to host.

params.name: Tag
params.description: A tag to identify this kind of message.

params.name: Message
params.description: The message data to send.

params.name: Mode
params.description: The transmission mode to send this message with.

actions.name: Simulate latency
actions.description: Simulate a delay and packet loss in sending/receiving messages. Useful for testing lag performance locally.
actions.display_text: Simulate latency [i]{0}[/i] seconds with variance [i]{1}[/i] and packet loss [i]{2}[/i]

params.name: Latency
params.description: Enter a latency in seconds to simulate. Sent and received messages will be artificially delayed.

params.name: PDV
params.description: Enter a packet delay variance in seconds to simulate. Sent and received messages will be artificially delayed.

params.name: Packet loss
params.description: Enter a packet loss percentage to simulate, from 0 to 1 (e.g. 0.05 for 5%). Sent and received messages will be artificially ignored or further delayed.

actions.name: Sync instance variable
actions.description: Add a synced object's instance variable to also sync over the network.
actions.display_text: Sync {0} variable [b]{1}[/b] (precision [i]{2}[/i], interpolation: [i]{3}[/i], client value tag: [i]{4}[/i])

params.name: Object
params.description: An object type already being synced. The chosen instance variable will also be synced.

params.name: Instance variable
params.description: Choose the instance variable in the above object to sync.

params.name: Precision
params.description: Choose the precision of the value to sync.

params.name: Interpolation
params.description: Choose the interpolation for clients to use between received values.

params.name: Client value tag
params.description: If this value corresponds to a client input value, the tag for the value. This allows the host to sync the value between peers with less latency.

actions.name: Associate object with peer
actions.description: Indicate an object which represents a connected peer.

params.name: Object
params.description: An object to associate with a peer. There must be exactly one of this object per connected peer.

params.name: Peer ID
params.description: The ID of the peer to associate the chosen object with.

actions.name: Add client input value
actions.description: Add a value to send to the host representing the client input state.
actions.display_text: Add client input value tag [b]{0}[/b], precision [i]{1}[/i], interpolation [i]{2}[/i]

params.name: Tag
params.description: A tag to identify this client input value.

params.name: Precision
params.description: Choose the precision of the client input value.

params.name: Interpolation
params.description: Choose the interpolation for the host to use between values.

actions.name: Set bandwidth profile
actions.description: Before joining a room, set Internet or LAN mode to adapt the use of the network.

params.name: Profile
params.description: The bandwidth profile to use. Do not use LAN mode over the Internet. However Internet mode is still suitable for LANs.

actions.name: Broadcast message
actions.description: Send a message from the host to every peer in the room.

params.name: From ID
params.description: Peer ID message originates from, if relaying a peer message. Leave blank to indicate from host.

params.name: Tag
params.description: A tag to identify this kind of message.

params.name: Message
params.description: The message data to send.

params.name: Mode
params.description: The transmission mode to send this message with.

actions.name: Kick peer
actions.description: Forcibly remove a peer from the room when host.

params.name: Peer ID
params.description: The ID of the peer to forcibly remove. Only works when host.

params.name: Reason
params.description: A string of the reason to give for kicking (optional).

actions.name: Set client state
actions.description: Set the client input state for a peer to indicate to the host their controls.
actions.display_text: Set client input state [i]{0}[/i] to value [b]{1}[/b]

params.name: Tag
params.description: A tag to identify the client input value to set. It must have been added previously.

params.name: Value
params.description: A number representing the client input state.

actions.name: Enable local input prediction
actions.description: Enable local input prediction for an object representing the local player.
actions.display_text: Enable local input prediction for {0} (avoid solids: [i]{1}[/i], platform mode: [i]{2}[/i])

params.name: Object
params.description: An object representing the local player to enable local input prediction for.

params.name: Avoid solids
params.description: Check to avoid input predicting into solid objects.

params.name: Platform mode
params.description: Check when using the Platform behavior to avoid input predicting on the Y axis when standing on the floor.

actions.name: Connect
actions.description: Connect to a signalling server to be able to join rooms.

params.name: Server
params.description: The signalling server URL to connect to.

actions.name: Disconnect
actions.description: Disconnect from the current signalling server.

actions.name: Add ICE server
actions.description: Add another ICE server to help establish connectivity. Several defaults are built-in.

params.name: ICE server
params.description: A custom ICE server, e.g. STUN or TURN, to help establish connectivity.

params.name: Username (optional)
params.description: If a TURN server, then the username to use with that server.

params.name: Credential (optional)
params.description: If a TURN server, then the credential to use with that server.

actions.name: Log in
actions.description: Once connected, log in to the signalling server with an alias.

params.name: Alias
params.description: The desired alias to use on the server. The server may assign you a different alias if it is taken.

actions.name: Join room
actions.description: Once logged in, join a room to meet other peers.
actions.display_text: Join room [b]{2}[/b] for game [i]{0}[/i] instance [i]{1}[/i] (max peers: [i]{3}[/i])

params.name: Game
params.description: A string uniquely identifying this game on the server. To help ensure uniqueness, include you or your company's name, e.g. "MyStudio-Asteroids" instead of just "Asteroids".

params.name: Instance
params.description: A string identifying an instance of the game, in case you wish to run separate instances.

params.name: Room
params.description: The name of the room to request joining.

params.name: Max peers
params.description: The maximum number of peers that can join this room. Only the host's value is used. Leave 0 for unlimited.

actions.name: Leave room
actions.description: Request to leave the current room on the signalling server. Peer connections are not affected.

actions.name: Request game instance list
actions.description: Request the list of game instances currently on the server.

params.name: Game
params.description: The game on the server to list instances for.

actions.name: Auto-join room
actions.description: Join the first room which is not full.
actions.display_text: Auto-join from room [b]{2}[/b] for game [i]{0}[/i] instance [i]{1}[/i] (max peers: [i]{3}[/i], {4})

params.name: Game
params.description: A string uniquely identifying this game on the server. To help ensure uniqueness, include you or your company's name, e.g. "MyStudio-Asteroids" instead of just "Asteroids".

params.name: Instance
params.description: A string identifying an instance of the game, in case you wish to run separate instances.

params.name: First room
params.description: The name of the first room to request joining. If the room is full, subsequent rooms will be checked ("room", "room2", "room3"...).

params.name: Max peers
params.description: The number of peers per room. Once full, later peers will be sent to the next room.

params.name: Locking
params.description: Locking the room prevents other peers joining again even after other peers leave.

actions.name: Request room list
actions.description: Request the list of rooms in a game instance currently on the server.

params.name: Game
params.description: The game on the server to list rooms from.

params.name: Instance
params.description: The game instance on the server to list rooms for.

params.name: Which
params.description: Optionally filter the returned rooms by their state.

actions.name: Sync object
actions.description: Automatically synchronise an object type over the network.

params.name: Object
params.description: An object type to sync over the network.

params.name: X
params.description: Whether to sync the X position of the object.

params.name: Y
params.description: Whether to sync the Y position of the object.

params.name: Angle
params.description: Whether to sync the angle of the object.

params.name: Precision
params.description: Choose the precision of the above data to sync. Higher precision requires more bandwidth.

params.name: Bandwidth
params.description: Choose the bandwidth setting for this object. Only choose 'Low' for highly predictable movement (e.g. linear constant speed).

actions.name: Transfer peer binary
actions.description: Transfer the content of a Binary Data object to a peer.
actions.display_text: Transfer peer [b]{0}[/b] binary {1} tag [i]{2}[/i] (filename [i]{3}[/i], MIME type [i]{4}[/i])

params.name: Peer ID
params.description: The ID of the peer to send data to. Leave empty to send to host.

params.name: Data
params.description: A Binary Data object with the data to send.

params.name: Tag
params.description: A tag to identify this transfer.

params.name: Filename
params.description: An optional string with a filename for this transfer.

params.name: MIME type
params.description: An optional string with a MIME type for this transfer, e.g. "image/png" for a PNG image.

actions.name: Cancel binary transfer
actions.description: Cancel an active binary data transfer.
actions.display_text: Cancel binary transfer for peer [b]{0}[/b] tag [i]{1}[/i]

params.name: Peer ID
params.description: The ID of the peer to cancel the transfer for.

params.name: Tag
params.description: The tag of the transfer to cancel.

actions.name: Send binary message
actions.description: Send binary data to a specific peer.

params.name: Peer ID
params.description: The ID of the peer to send the message to. Leave empty to send to host.

params.name: Data
params.description: A Binary Data object with the data to send.

params.name: Mode
params.description: The transmission mode to send this message with.

expressions.name: ListInstanceCount
expressions.description: The number of game instances available.

expressions.name: ListInstanceName
expressions.description: The name of a game instance at an index.

params.name: Index
params.description: Index

expressions.name: ListInstancePeerCount
expressions.description: The total number of peers in a game instance at an index.

params.name: Index
params.description: Index

expressions.name: ListRoomCount
expressions.description: The number of rooms returned.

expressions.name: ListRoomName
expressions.description: The name of a room at an index.

params.name: Index
params.description: Index

expressions.name: ListRoomPeerCount
expressions.description: The total number of peers in a room at an index.

params.name: Index
params.description: Index

expressions.name: ListRoomMaxPeerCount
expressions.description: The maximum number of peers for a room at an index.

params.name: Index
params.description: Index

expressions.name: ListRoomState
expressions.description: The room state at an index ("available", "locked" or "full").

params.name: Index
params.description: Index

expressions.name: PeerID
expressions.description: The ID of relevant peer in a trigger.

expressions.name: PeerAlias
expressions.description: The alias of relevant peer in a trigger.

expressions.name: HostID
expressions.description: The ID of the room host.

expressions.name: HostAlias
expressions.description: The alias of the room host.

expressions.name: Message
expressions.description: The message received in a message trigger.

expressions.name: Tag
expressions.description: The tag of the message or binary transfer in a trigger.

expressions.name: FromID
expressions.description: The ID of the user the message is from in a message trigger.

expressions.name: FromAlias
expressions.description: The alias of the user the message is from in a message trigger.

expressions.name: PeerAliasFromID
expressions.description: Get a peer's alias for a given peer ID.

params.name: id
params.description: Peer ID

expressions.name: PeerLatency
expressions.description: Get the latency (ping time) for a peer.

params.name: id
params.description: Peer ID

expressions.name: PeerPDV
expressions.description: Get the packet delay variation for a peer.

params.name: id
params.description: Peer ID

expressions.name: PeerCount
expressions.description: The number of connected peers in the current room.

expressions.name: LeaveReason
expressions.description: In 'On peer disconnected', the leave reason if known.

expressions.name: PeerIDAt
expressions.description: The ID of the nth connected peer in the room.

params.name: Index
params.description: Peer index

expressions.name: PeerAliasAt
expressions.description: The alias of the nth connected peer in the room.

params.name: Index
params.description: Peer index

expressions.name: PeerState
expressions.description: When host, get the client input state of a peer.

params.name: id
params.description: Peer ID

params.name: tag
params.description: Client value tag

expressions.name: LagCompensateX
expressions.description: The X position of a moving peer as it appears to another peer.

params.name: movingPeerID
params.description: Peer ID to move

params.name: fromPeerID
params.description: Peer ID to compensate for

expressions.name: LagCompensateY
expressions.description: The Y position of a moving peer as it appears to another peer.

params.name: movingPeerID
params.description: Peer ID to move

params.name: fromPeerID
params.description: Peer ID to compensate for

expressions.name: LagCompensateAngle
expressions.description: The angle of a moving peer as it appears to another peer.

params.name: movingPeerID
params.description: Peer ID to move

params.name: fromPeerID
params.description: Peer ID to compensate for

expressions.name: SignallingURL
expressions.description: The URL of the current signalling server.

expressions.name: SignallingVersion
expressions.description: The version of the current signalling server.

expressions.name: SignallingName
expressions.description: The name of the current signalling server.

expressions.name: SignallingOperator
expressions.description: The operator of the current signalling server.

expressions.name: SignallingMOTD
expressions.description: The 'message of the day' for the current signalling server.

expressions.name: MyAlias
expressions.description: The alias for the current user.

expressions.name: CurrentGame
expressions.description: The current game name joined.

expressions.name: CurrentInstance
expressions.description: The current game instance joined.

expressions.name: CurrentRoom
expressions.description: The current room joined.

expressions.name: ErrorMessage
expressions.description: In 'on signalling error', the error message.

expressions.name: MyID
expressions.description: The ID for the current user.

expressions.name: StatOutboundCount
expressions.description: Number of outbound messages per second.

expressions.name: StatOutboundBandwidth
expressions.description: Network uploaded bytes per second.

expressions.name: StatInboundCount
expressions.description: Number of inbound messages per second.

expressions.name: StatInboundBandwidth
expressions.description: Network downloaded bytes per second.

expressions.name: ClientXError
expressions.description: Client-side input prediction X error from host, for debugging.

expressions.name: ClientYError
expressions.description: Client-side input prediction Y error from host, for debugging.

expressions.name: HostX
expressions.description: Host X position for debugging input prediction.

expressions.name: HostY
expressions.description: Host Y position for debugging input prediction.

expressions.name: StatOutboundDecompressedBandwidth
expressions.description: Decompressed data sent in bytes per second.

expressions.name: StatInboundDecompressedBandwidth
expressions.description: Decompressed data received in bytes per second.

expressions.name: PeerIDFromAlias
expressions.description: Get a peer's ID from their alias.

params.name: alias
params.description: Peer alias

expressions.name: Filename
expressions.description: Filename of a binary data transfer, if specified.

expressions.name: MIMEType
expressions.description: MIME type of a binary data transfer, if specified.

expressions.name: TransferProgress
expressions.description: In a binary transfer progress trigger, the transfer progress in the range 0-1.

expressions.name: TransferSize
expressions.description: In a binary transfer start trigger, the size in bytes of the data being transmitted.
